mapper.sql: CLUSTER.ID, CLUSTER.CLUSTER_NAME, CLUSTER.SST_PASSWORD, CLUSTER.HCLUSTER_ID, CLUSTER.ADMIN_USER, CLUSTER.ADMIN_PASSWORD, CLUSTER.GCE_ID, CLUSTER.GCE_PACKAGE_ID, CLUSTER.STATUS, CLUSTER.DELETED, CLUSTER.CREATE_TIME, CLUSTER.CREATE_USER, CLUSTER.UPDATE_TIME, CLUSTER.UPDATE_USER
mapper.select: select ,u.USERNAME,h.HCLUSTER_NAME_ALIAS from EC_GCE_CLUSTER CLUSTER left join WEBPORTAL_USER u on CLUSTER.CREATE_USER = u.ID left join WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER h on CLUSTER.HCLUSTER_ID = h.ID where CLUSTER.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ,u.USERNAME,h.HCLUSTER_NAME_ALIAS from EC_GCE_CLUSTER CLUSTER left join WEBPORTAL_USER u on CLUSTER.CREATE_USER = u.ID left join WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER h on CLUSTER.HCLUSTER_ID = h.ID where CLUSTER.CLUSTER_NAME=#{clusterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
,u.USERNAME,h.HCLUSTER_NAME_ALIAS from EC_GCE_CLUSTER CLUSTER left join WEBPORTAL_USER u on CLUSTER.CREATE_USER = u.ID left join WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER h on CLUSTER.HCLUSTER_ID = h.ID
and u.USERNAME like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') escape '^'
and h.HCLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{hclusterName},'%') escape '^'

select
,u.USERNAME,h.HCLUSTER_NAME_ALIAS from EC_GCE_CLUSTER CLUSTER left join WEBPORTAL_USER u on CLUSTER.CREATE_USER = u.ID left join WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER h on CLUSTER.HCLUSTER_ID = h.ID
and u.USERNAME like CONCAT('%',#{params.userName},'%') escape '^'
and h.HCLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{params.hclusterName},'%') escape '^'
ORDER BY CLUSTER.CREATE_TIME DESC
limit #{page.startRowPosition},#{page.recordsPerPage}

select count(1) from EC_GCE_CLUSTER CLUSTER left join WEBPORTAL_USER u on CLUSTER.CREATE_USER = u.ID left join WEBPORTAL_HCLUSTER h on CLUSTER.HCLUSTER_ID = h.ID
and u.USERNAME like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') escape '^'
and h.HCLUSTER_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{hclusterName},'%') escape '^'
mapper.insert: insert into EC_GCE_CLUSTER (CLUSTER_NAME, SST_PASSWORD, HCLUSTER_ID, ADMIN_USER, ADMIN_PASSWORD, GCE_ID, GCE_PACKAGE_ID, STATUS, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER) values (#{clusterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sstPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hclusterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adminUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gcePackageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, now(), #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT})
